text: La voix du bon Dieu (English: Good God's Voice) is the debut album by Canadian singer Celine Dion. ==Track listing== #"La voix du bon Dieu" (Eddy Marnay, Suzanne-Mia Dumont, Céline Dion) – 3:22 #"Au secours" (Robert Leroux, Pierre Létourneau, Céline Dion) – 3:31 #"L'amour viendra" (Marnay, Amerigo Cassella, Dario Baldan Bembo, Céline Dion) – 4:20 #"Autour de moi" (Thérèse Dion, Pierre A. Tremblay, Céline Dion) – 3:00 #"Grand maman" (T. Dion, Céline Dion, Jacques Dion) – 3:42 #"Ce n'était qu'un rêve" (T. Dion, Céline Dion, J.Dion) – 3:52 #"Seul un oiseau blanc" (Marnay, Daniel Hétu, Céline Dion) – 4:17 #"T'ire l'aiguille" (Marnay, Emilie Stern, Eddie Barclay, Céline Dion) – 2:24 #"Les roses blanches" (Charles Louis Pothier, Léon Rathier, Céline Dion) – 5:56 ==Release history== Region Date Label Format Catalog Canada November 9, 1981 Super Étoiles Record SPE 4101 Cassette 16-SP 1900 Canada 1983 Saisons Record SNS 70000 Cassette SNS 4-70000 Category:1981 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Celine Dion albums Category:Pop albums Category:Songs in French
title: La voix du bon Dieu
